name: Snowball (itch) (Happy Fish Gaming Co)
description:
In a small world where the only direction is up and down, a young mountain goat named Snowball is trying to get home.

Jump from cliff to cliff while avoiding dangerous eagles, avalanches, and more. Push around ice to make elaborate towers to climb your way from the bottom of a ravine to the very top, where a warm, cozy igloo will be waiting to take you in.

 Controls:
-WASD for movement
-R to reset the level
-Hold down C to power up a jump. Release to jump.
-SPACE to jump
-Collide with ice blocks to move them
